pages.text_verbatim_title_block: WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD. ... BLAKESTYLE DESIGN & DRAFTING INC. ... PROJECT: WERKEMA BARN ADDITION 38128 MONCRIEF RD. AUBURN, ON. DRAWING: ELEVATIONS A2
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides elevation views of the Werkema Barn Addition, showing the structural columns and roof line. It includes multiple elevation perspectives to illustrate the overall design and structural components of the barn addition.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD. ... BLAKESTYLE DESIGN & DRAFTING INC. ... PROJECT: WERKEMA BARN ADDITION 38128 MONCRIEF RD. AUBURN, ON. DRAWING: MAIN FLOOR PLAN A1
pages.general_notes_verbatim: NOTES: EXISTING BANK BARN: 1944 SQ. FT. ADDITION: 1200 SQ. FT. TOTAL BUILDING AREA: 3144 SQ. FT.
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet details the main floor plan of the Werkema Barn Addition, including the structural grid and key dimensions. It provides a comprehensive layout of the ground floor, indicating the total building area and the addition's footprint.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD. ... BLAKESTYLE DESIGN & DRAFTING INC. ... PROJECT: WERKEMA BARN ADDITION 38128 MONCRIEF RD. AUBURN, ON. DRAWING: ROOF FRAMING PLAN S2
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet illustrates the roof framing plan for the Werkema Barn Addition, showing the layout of structural trusses. It provides a detailed view of the roof structure, essential for understanding the load distribution and support system.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD. ... BLAKESTYLE DESIGN & DRAFTING INC. ... PROJECT: WERKEMA BARN ADDITION 38128 MONCRIEF RD. AUBURN, ON. DRAWING: BUILDING SECTIONS A3
pages.general_notes_verbatim: PROVIDE STAMPED STEEL SHOP DRAWINGS TO PROJECT ENGINEER TO REVIEW.
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides building sections for the Werkema Barn Addition, including detailed views of beam lines and structural connections. It is crucial for understanding the vertical relationships and structural integrity of the building components.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD. ... BLAKESTYLE DESIGN & DRAFTING INC. ... PROJECT: WERKEMA BARN ADDITION 38128 MONCRIEF RD. AUBURN, ON. DRAWING: FOUNDATION PLAN S1
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet outlines the foundation plan for the Werkema Barn Addition, detailing the layout of footings and structural supports. It is essential for understanding the base structure and load distribution at the foundation level.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD. ... BLAKESTYLE DESIGN & DRAFTING INC. ... PROJECT: WERKEMA BARN ADDITION 38128 MONCRIEF RD. AUBURN, ON. DRAWING: NOTES N1
pages.general_notes_verbatim: GENERAL CONSTRUCTION NOTES ... FRAMING NOTES ... DESIGN LOADS ...
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet contains general construction notes, framing notes, and design loads for the Werkema Barn Addition. It provides essential guidelines and specifications that apply to the entire project, ensuring compliance with structural and safety standards.
